data.actual_result: No spinner icon. So you don't know when it's loading more or when you reached the end
data.expected_result: When you reach the bottom of loaded entries, it should display a spinner icon as the chat/search results do
data.short_description: [Audit Logs] No spinner icon when it's loading more entries as you scroll down
data.steps_to_repro: - Access Audit Logs in a server with lots of entries - Scroll down fast so it stops you before it's loading more - Try scroll down more after a few moments
